details:
noun
- (Yiddish) a devious trick
= synonyms: schtik, shtick, schtick
- in Yiddish, a prank or piece of clowning
= example: in Yiddish, a prank or piece of clowning
= synonyms: schtik, shtick, schtick
- (Yiddish) a contrived and often used bit of business that a performer uses to steal attention
= example: (Yiddish) a contrived and often used bit of business that a performer uses to steal attention
= synonyms: schtik, shtick, schtick
- (Yiddish) a little
= synonyms: schtik, shtick, schtick
